pullRequest.title: [Dialogue] Part 4: Runtime Configuration and ETE Testing
pullRequest.bodyText:
Goals (and why):

Users should be able to specify whether Dialogue should be used.
Dialogue should be evaluated on an end-to-end basis.

Implementation Description (bullets):

Specify useDialogue in RemotingClientConfig (a part of runtime config)
Switch between clients dependent on runtime config.

Testing (What was existing testing like?  What have you done to improve it?):

Run the existing ETEs with Dialogue.

Concerns (what feedback would you like?):

There isn't a test that the Dialogue versions of these ETE tests actually use Dialogue!
A lot of copying.

Where should we start reviewing?: TransactionManagers
Priority (whenever / two weeks / yesterday): this week

nodes.bodyText: I worry that lists of test suites like this will very quickly get out of sync with the c-j-r versions. Maybe OK if we can burn down the migration pretty fast, but i think if it takes longer than 2 weeks then this copy&pasting might be too much of a risk
